action.decreaseOffsetButton: Decrease offset to so that next subtitle is at current position. Hold to decrease by 100ms.
action.increaseOffsetButton: Increase offset to so that previous subtitle is at current position. Hold to increase by 100ms.

ankiDialog.cannotUpdateAudio: 音频剪辑无法更新，因为它已经被录制过
ankiDialog.foundDuplicateNotes: 已发现{{count}}张 {{field}} 字段中含有单词 {{word}} 的卡片
ankiDialog.foundNoDuplicateNote: 未发现 {{field}} 字段中含有单词 {{word}} 的卡片
ankiDialog.imageFileLinkLost: 由于页面重新加载，图像文件链接丢失
ankiDialog.tagList: 逗号分隔的字符串列表
ankiDialog.title: Anki导出
ankiDialog.updateLastCard: 更新最后一张插入Anki的卡牌

binds.adjustOffsetToNextSubtitle: 调整字幕偏移量，使下一个字幕位于当前时间戳
binds.adjustOffsetToPreviousSubtitle: 调整字幕偏移量，使上一个字幕处于当前时间戳
binds.adjustOffsetToSubtitle: 调整字幕偏移量，使上一个/下一个字幕处于当前时间戳
binds.ankiExport: 挖掘当前字幕并打开Anki对话框
binds.extensionAnkiDialog: 挖掘当前字幕并打开Anki导出对话框。当视频在没有字幕文件的情况下同步时，开始/停止录制音频。
binds.extensionCopySubtitle: 挖掘当前字幕。当视频在没有字幕文件的情况下同步时，开始/停止录制音频。
binds.extensionSelectSubtitleTrack: 选择要加载的字幕音轨。
binds.extensionTakeScreenshot: 手动拍摄屏幕截图，覆盖挖掘时自动拍摄的屏幕截图。
binds.extensionToggleRecording: 手动启动/停止音频录制，即使加载了字幕文件。
binds.extensionUpdateLastCard: 使用asbplayer捕获的媒体更新上次创建的Anki卡。当视频在没有字幕文件的情况下同步时，开始/停止录制音频。
binds.seekToBeginningOfCurrentSubtitle: 搜索到当前字幕的开头
binds.seekToBeginningOfCurrentOrPreviousSubtit: Seek to beginning of current/previous subtitle
binds.seekToPreviousSubtitle: 查找上一个/下一个字幕
binds.seekToSubtitle: 查找上一个/下一个字幕
binds.takeScreenshot: 手动拍摄屏幕截图，覆盖挖掘时自动拍摄的屏幕截图
binds.toggleAsbplayerBlurTrack: Toggle subtitle track {{trackNumber}} blur in asbplayer
binds.toggleVideoSubtitleTrack1: 切换视频中的字幕音轨1
binds.toggleVideoSubtitleTrack2: 切换视频中的字幕音轨2
binds.toggleVideoSubtitleTrack3: 切换视频中的字幕音轨3
binds.toggleVideoSubtitleTracks: 切换视频中的字幕音轨
binds.updateLastCard: 使用asbplayer捕获的屏幕截图、音频等更新上次创建的Anki卡。
binds.exportCard: Export card to Anki, bypassing dialog.

copyHistory.downloadMinedSubsAsSrt: 下载已挖掘字幕作为SRT文件

error.bothAudioAndVideNotAllowed: 无法同时加载音频和视频文件
error.onlyOneAudioFile: 无法同时打开两个音频文件
error.onlyOneDirectoryAllowed: 一次不能加载多个目录
error.onlyOneVideoFile: 无法同时打开两个视频文件
error.subdirectoriesNotAllowed: 无法加载包含子目录的目录
error.unknownExtension: 无法确定{{fileName}}的扩展名类型
error.videoPlayerDragAndDropNotAllowed: 视频播放器无法接收拖放的文件。将其放到视频帧之外。

settings.autoLoadDetectedSubs: 自动加载检测到的字幕
settings.autoLoadDetectedSubsFailure: Prompt on failure to auto-load subtitles
settings.condensedPlaybackMinSkipInterval: 压缩播放最小跳过间隔
settings.openSubtitleList: Open subtitle list when loading subtitles

videoDataSync.loadSubtitlesFirst: 必须先加载字幕，然后才能开始挖掘。
videoDataSync.failedToAutoLoad: Could not auto-load subtitles in your preferred language.
videoDataSync.rememberTrackPreference: Remember these track choices for this site
videoDataSync.ftue: Auto-detected subtitle tracks can be selected here. asbplayer does not know how to detect subtitles on every site. You can always load your own subtitle files.

videoSelect.selectVideo: 选择一个视频元素以将其与asbplayer同步。
videoSelect.syncBeforeMine: 视频元素必须与asbplayer同步，然后才能进行挖掘。选择一个视频元素以将其与asbplayer同步。

ftue.welcomeBody: Check out the <0>readme</0> to see how to get started.
ftue.welcomeBody2: Scroll down for a quick intro, or check out the <0>user guide</0>.
ftue.toolbar: Click the 🧩 icon in the toolbar, and select <0>asbplayer</0> to open the asbplayer <1>Popup</1>.<2/>Use the 📌 button to pin asbplayer to the toolbar for easy access.
ftue.sidePanel: Use the <0>Side Panel</0> to <1>navigate</1> between subtitles, <2>mine</2> subtitles, and more.
ftue.overlayScroll: <0>Scroll</0> the rightmost control to switch between <1>subtitle navigation</1>, <2>subtitle offset</2>, and <3>playback rate</3> controls.
ftue.overlay: Use the <0>Video Overlay</0> to <1>mine</1> and <2>toggle</2> subtitles, <3>switch playback modes</3>, and more.
ftue.congrats: That's it for the basics! Feel free to play around on this page.
ftue.loadSubtitles: The first step to using asbplayer is always to load subtitles onto a video. Use the <0>Side Panel</0> to load subtitles onto the video on this page.<1/>Hint: The <2>Side Panel</2> can be accessed through the <3>Popup</3>.
ftue.loadSubtitlesFirefox: The first step to using asbplayer is always to load subtitles onto a video. <0>Right-click</0> on the video and find the asbplayer <1>context menu</1> to load subtitles.
ftue.loadSubtitlesMobile: The first step to using asbplayer is always to load subtitles onto a video. Open the track selector by selecting <0>asbplayer</0> in the <1>extensions</1> menu.
ftue.ankiConnectError: Once you've opened Anki and installed AnkiConnect, clicking the ⟳ button should make the error go away.
ftue.deck: Select the <0>Deck</0> where you want your cards to go.
ftue.defaultDeck: If you don't have any decks yet, you can <0>create the default one</0>.
ftue.anki: <0>Anki</0> is the most popular flashcard program in the world. It uses an algorithm called <1>SRS</1> to make learning information very efficient.
ftue.ankiDialog: Use the <0>Anki Export Dialog</0> to create Anki flashcards. In most cases, asbplayer can fill out <1>sentence</1>, <2>image</2>, and <3>audio</3> automatically.
ftue.configureAnki: Click here to configure asbplayer's integration with Anki.
ftue.ankiDialogDefinition: Put any details you want to remember about the sentence in the <0>Definition Field</0>.
ftue.ankiDialogDefinitionHint: Hint: A dictionary extension like <0>Yomitan</0> makes this really easy.
ftue.noteType: Select the <0>Note Type</0> for your cards. The <1>Note Type</1> determines how the front and back of your cards will look.
ftue.defaultNoteType: If you don't have any note types yet, you can <0>create the default one</0>.
ftue.ankiFields: The rest of the drop-downs configure how content gets mapped into fields of your card.
ftue.testCard: When ready, you can create a test card to see how it looks.

update.heading: asbplayer just updated to version {{version}}.
update.alert: asbplayer updated to version {{version}}. Check out the <0>release notes</0>.

info.manualMiningIntervalPrompt: Use mining shortcut again to select time range

landing.cta: 拖放字幕和媒体文件，或<1>浏览</1>。
landing.extensionNotInstalled: 安装<1>Chrome扩展</1>以将字幕与流媒体视频同步
landing.videoElementsDetected: Load subtitles onto a video to start using asbplayer.

activeTabPermissionRequest.title: Enable audio recording
activeTabPermissionRequest.prompt: Click on the asbplayer action button in the top-right of the browser window to enable audio recording for this tab.
activeTabPermissionRequest.grantedPrompt: Audio recording has been enabled for this tab. You can now begin mining.

audioCaptureFailed.message: DRM-protected audio cannot be captured on the Firefox version of asbplayer.

settings.alwaysPlayOnSubtitleRepeat: Always play (unpause) after invoking above shortcut
settings.autoCopy: 自动将当前字幕复制到剪贴板
settings.autoPausePreferenceHelperText: 不启用自动暂停。设置启用自动暂停时暂停的首选项。
settings.copyOnMine: 将挖掘的字幕复制到剪贴板
settings.corsHelperText: 请确保{{origin}}在您的AnkiConnect设置中的webCorsOriginalList中，如此<0>video</0>中所示。
settings.imageBasedSubtitleScaleFactor: 基于图像的字幕比例因子
settings.mp3Preference: 将音频重新编码为mp3（较慢）
settings.preCacheSubtitleDomHelperText: 如果启用，asbplayer将预呈现屏幕外文档中的字幕文本元素，并将这些元素重新用于字幕显示。这允许外部代码在显示字幕文本之前持续修改字幕文本。
settings.subtitleOutlineThicknessHelperText: 在字幕文本周围添加轮廓线。如果这会导致线条重叠，请尝试使用其他字体。
settings.subtitleTrackSelectorHelper: Changes settings for ALL tracks. Settings that already have track-specific values are hidden.
settings.subtitleBlurDescription: Hides selected subtitle tracks by blurring them. Can be un-blurred on mouse hover.
settings.subtitleRegexFilterTextReplacement: 字幕正则筛选器文本替换
settings.tagsHelperText: 逗号分隔的字符串列表
settings.title: 设置
settings.missingFieldError: Field "{{field}}" not found in note type
settings.firefoxExtensionShortcutHelp: Edit this shortcut from the Plugin manager at about:addons.

subtitlePlayer.multiSubtitleSelectHelp: Click, hold, and drag to mine multiple subtitles
